activities: Provision of revenue and expense management and accounting software and services solutions to asset management industry.  Bonaire may obtain and possess personally identifiable information incidentally pursuant to providing maintenance support and other services for our products. Such information is used internally for that limited purpose; it is neither disclosed to third parties, nor retained longer than necessary.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client or customer data, processed electronically and manually.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
